emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Synthesis
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems that can automatically generate complete code modules or applications from high-level requirements.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could lead to significant job displacement in coding but also empower non-developers to create software, broadening access to technology creation.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires advanced AI capabilities, trust in AI-generated code, and regulatory frameworks for AI in software development.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Lace Interface
emerging_technologies.description: A brain-computer interface that integrates directly with neural tissue to enhance cognitive functions or control devices.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Raises ethical issues regarding privacy, autonomy, and the potential for cognitive enhancement disparities.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Biocompatibility, ethical considerations, regulatory approval, and public acceptance of invasive technology.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Secure Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: A blockchain technology resistant to quantum computing attacks, ensuring long-term data integrity and security.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances security in financial and governmental systems, potentially reducing cybercrime and enhancing trust in digital transactions.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Development of quantum-resistant algorithms, integration with existing blockchain networks, and industry-wide acceptance.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Traffic Management
emerging_technologies.description: A system that dynamically manages traffic flow in cities through AI, reducing congestion and optimizing energy use.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves quality of life through reduced travel time and pollution, but requires significant infrastructure investment.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: City infrastructure readiness, regulatory approval, and public trust in autonomous systems.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Coding Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: Tools like Cursor and Copilot evolve into comprehensive development environments where AI assists in all aspects of coding.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in software development, changing the nature of programming jobs and education.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart City Infrastructure
mainstream_technologies.description: Cities leverage IoT and AI for optimizing services like energy, water, waste management, and public transport.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in urban planning with significant investments from governments and private sectors.

epoch_themes.description: AI becomes ubiquitous, transforming industries and daily life with intelligent automation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shift in workforce skills, job market, and educational systems towards AI literacy and ethical considerations.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global push for AI ethics, AI-driven economic growth, and international AI policy frameworks.

epoch_themes.description: Technological advancements focus on creating sustainable systems and preparing for environmental challenges.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhances urban living standards, reduces environmental impact, but might increase urban-rural divide.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Move towards green tech, renewable energy, and circular economy principles.
